rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a north-facing door leading to the main living area. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall enhance natural light and ventilation.
An open-plan living room with large floor-to-ceiling windows, promoting a bright atmosphere. Designed in Chettinad style with intricate carved details and wooden accents.
A dining area adjoining the living room, featuring traditional Chettinad motifs. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side provide ample light.
A fully-equipped kitchen with modern amenities integrated into the traditional Chettinad design. Includes storage and a small prep area, with windows for ventilation.
A compact utility space for laundry and storage, designed with efficiency in mind while incorporating local design elements.

openings.description: A grand north-facing entrance door, adhering to Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and dining area for enhanced natural light.
A functional window in the kitchen to provide ventilation.
